name: Equipment-Predictive-Maintenance-Developer-App
description: An AI-powered application to predict equipment maintenance needs and explain failure risks in advance

appStages.name: Introduction
Data-Explore
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eEquipment Maintenance Data Exploration\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eClick on \u0027Explore Maintenance Data\u0027 to analyze equipment data to understand asset distribution, monitor failure trends, assess operational status, and uncover patterns in replacement.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n   \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html3",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv Class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv Class\u003d\"Header\"\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eFeatures Description of Maintenance Logs\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cdiv class\u003d\"custom-table-container\"\u003e\r\n      \u003cdiv class\u003d\"custom-table-header\"\u003e\r\n        \u003ctable class\u003d\"custom-table\"\u003e\r\n          \u003cthead\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003cth\u003eField Name\u003c/th\u003e\r\n              \u003cth\u003eDescription\u003c/th\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003c/thead\u003e\r\n        \u003c/table\u003e\r\n      \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n      \u003cdiv class\u003d\"custom-table-body\"\u003e\r\n        \u003ctable class\u003d\"custom-table\"\u003e\r\n          \u003ctbody\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eTimestamp\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eThe date and time when the engine event was logged. Format: dd-mm-yyyy HH:MM.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eEngine_ID\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eUnique identifier for the engine unit.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eFailure_Type\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eThe specific type of failure or issue detected (e.g., oil_leak, overheating).\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eAction_Taken\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eThe maintenance or corrective action performed by the technician.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eTechnician_Notes\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eFree-text field capturing technicians observations and performed procedures.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n\r\n          \u003c/tbody\u003e\r\n        \u003c/table\u003e\r\n      \u003c/div\u003e\r\n    \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html2",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv Class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv Class\u003d\"Header\"\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eFeatures Description of Sensor Data\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cdiv class\u003d\"custom-table-container\"\u003e\r\n      \u003cdiv class\u003d\"custom-table-header\"\u003e\r\n        \u003ctable class\u003d\"custom-table\"\u003e\r\n          \u003cthead\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003cth\u003eField Name\u003c/th\u003e\r\n              \u003cth\u003eDescription\u003c/th\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003c/thead\u003e\r\n        \u003c/table\u003e\r\n      \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n      \u003cdiv class\u003d\"custom-table-body\"\u003e\r\n        \u003ctable class\u003d\"custom-table\"\u003e\r\n          \u003ctbody\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eTimestamp\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eThe date and time when the engine data was recorded.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eEngine_ID\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eUnique identifier for the engine unit.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eRPM\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eEngine revolutions per minute indicates the speed of engine rotation.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eOil_Pressure\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eMeasured oil pressure inside the engine (likely in psi or similar unit).\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003ecoolant_temp\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eTemperature of the engine coolant used to monitor overheating risk.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003evibration\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eMeasured vibration intensity higher values may signal potential faults.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n           \u003c/tbody\u003e\r\n        \u003c/table\u003e\r\n      \u003c/div\u003e\r\n    \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",

      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,

      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eRCA Findings and Analysis\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eGenerate RCA reports to uncover key failure patterns, understand rule-based risk triggers, and receive actionable insights for proactive maintenance.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n   \u003c/div\u003e",
